articles.title: RamBase - Database Engine

articles.description: A software to suggest topics for a list of words based on their meaning and usage

articles.description: Developed three levels of an adventure game using C++ without using any libraries

articles.description: A highly accurate Neural Collaborative Filtering Movie Recommendation System based on implicit feedback
